record.id: field.name=NULL and file.name=NULL and term="Change open" and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"

brief.brief: Users request changes by opening Change requests.
Service Manager uses the Change Management Application to log these requests and track responsible parties of the changes and the actions.

detail.detail: To open a Change request, press the appropriate option for Change Management or indicate the appropriate command on any Command line and press Enter.
Service Manager displays the blank Change Header Format screen.
Specify the Category or leave it blank to choose from a search list, and press F1 (Open) to open the Change record.
Service Manager generates a change number and fills in some of the header fields.
The status field automatically defaults to INITIAL and the approval groups and approval statuses are set at Pending.
Fill in as much information as you know about the change and press F2 (Open).
